menuItems.name: HALF AND HALF
menuItems.description: Create your own combo! Choose two smaller portions from any of our sandwiches, salads, or soup of the day!

menuItems.name: ONE AND A HALF
menuItems.description: Create your own combo! Choose one whole portion of any sandwich, salad, or soup of the day and a half portion of any other!

menuItems.name: BLAKE'S CHOICE
menuItems.description: Panini with sliced turkey, colby jack cheese, and Paint Box Bacon on whole wheat bread. Served with avacado ranch.

menuItems.name: NATHAN'S #1'
menuItems.description: Panini with our Paint Box Meatloaf, colby jack cheese, and Paint Box Bacon on whole wheat bread. Served with our Sister Sauce.

menuItems.name: JORDAN'S SPECIAL
menuItems.description: Warmed sliced turkey, colby jack cheese, and Paint Box bacon on a Paint Box Bun. Served with avacado ranch.

menuItems.name: ANNIE O'
menuItems.description: Panini with sliced chicken breast, pepper jack cheese, and Paint Box Bacon on Paint Box Bun. Served with chipotle ranch.

menuItems.name: JULIE
menuItems.description: Warmed sliced chicken breast, colby jack cheese, and Paint Box Bacon on a Paint Box Bun. Served with avacado ranch.

menuItems.name: CHEESE TO THE THIRD
menuItems.description: Our spin on a grilled cheese with gouda, provalone, and colby jack on a whole wheat bread. Served with our warm tomato basil sauce.

menuItems.name: PAINT BOX PICASSO
menuItems.description: Panini with sliced chicken breast, caramelized onions, and our Special Sauce on a Paint Box Bun.

menuItems.name: BERRIED TREASURE
menuItems.description: Sliced turkey whipped cream cheese, sweet red pepper relish, and spring mix greens served on a cranberry walnut bun.

menuItems.name: HEN-RIETTA
menuItems.description: Chicken salad and spring mix greens on your choice of a cranberry walnut bun or Paint Box Bun.

menuItems.name: PAINT BOX CLUB
menuItems.description: Sliced turkey, ham, salami, bacon, colby jack cheese, and lettuce on a Paint Box Bun. Served with a side of mayo.

title: SALADS 9.25
disclaimer: All salads are served with two slices of baguette and dressing on the side.

menuItems.name: PAINT BOX HOUSE
menuItems.description: Mixed greens, parmesan cheese, pine nuts, dried cranberries and our Paint Box Bacon. Pair with our cranberry citrus, jayne's sweet vinaigreete, or balsamic dressing!

menuItems.name: PB300
menuItems.description: Our 300 calorie answer to your prayers! Mixed greens, roasted veggies, diced chicken breast, and shaved parmesan. Pair with our balsamic dresssing!

menuItems.name: BROOKE O'BRIAN
menuItems.description: Mixed greens, feta, roasted veggies, and pine nuts. Pair with our balasmic dressing!

menuItems.name: OLD SCHOOL
menuItems.description: Mixed greens, diced turkey breast, colby jack cheese, diced eggs, and Paint Box Bacon. Pair with our house made ranch or avocado cream!

menuItems.name: CHICKEN SALAD
menuItems.description: Diced chicken breast, celery, grapes, and diced eggs in a mayo based dresssing. Served on a bed of mixed greens.

menuItems.name: SAVANNAH SALAD
menuItems.description: Mixed greens, diced turkey breast, parmesan cheese, carrots, cranberries, Paint Box Bacon, and glazed pecans. Pair with our house made ranch or chipotle ranch!

menuItems.name: SOUTHWEST CHICKEN
menuItems.description: Mixed greens, chicken breast, colby jack cheese, roaasted corn, black beans, and tortilla strips. Pair with our chipotle ranch, avocado cream, or house made ranch!

menuItems.name: INNER ARTIST
menuItems.description: Feed your inner artist and create your own salad by combining one protein with four other toppings artfully arranged over mixed greens.

title: FAMILY-SIZED SALADS 34.00
disclaimer: Go big or go home(or back to work). Get any of our salads family-sized with a pint of our dressing to take away! (serves 6-8)

title: SOUP OF THE DAY
disclaimer: Ask about our hand-crafed soup of the day!
menuItems: Pair with our almost famous ham and chedder melts

menuItems.name: THE LITTLE ARTIST
menuItems.description: Our tasty and fun kid-friendly option! Served in a muffin tray, you get your choice of a sandwich (however you'd like it) served with Cheez-its and fruit!
